document.full_text: a leading corporate governance body has urged shareholders in barclays  to oppose executive pay at the bank, calling its disclosure "opaque" and its design "overly complex."
document.title: pirc urges barclays investors to oppose pay plans
lines_and_colors: a leading corporate governance body has urged shareholders in barclays  to oppose executive pay at the bank, calling its disclosure "opaque" and its design "overly complex."
